original_text: Instead, I would really be doing something wrong if I tried to obey all those rules again. I would be building again something that I had destroyed. That would really be against God's Law.
korean_text: 만일 내가 헐었던 것을 다시 세우면 내가 나를 범법한 자로 만드는 것이라

sentences.original_text: Instead, I would really be doing something wrong
sentences.korean_translation: 대신에, 나는 정말로 잘못된 일을 하게 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: if I tried to obey all those rules again
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 내가 다시 그 모든 규칙들을 지키려고 시도한다면

sentences.original_text: I would be building again something
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 다시 무언가를 세우게 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: That would really be against God's Law
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 정말로 하나님의 법에 위배되는 것입니다
